content: Stud holder change tool X-SHT F3 ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening ### FEATURES:Features Flexibility - quickly exchange stud holders to suit your needs with the stud holder change tool Save time and labor – Stud fusion accessories help complete your stud fusion kit for faster and safer Stud fusion that can be performed by non-specialist, trained operators.
